code: import{Menu}from"antd";import Sider from"antd/es/layout/Sider";import{useState}from"react";import router from"router";import items,{submenuKeys}from"./VerticalMenuItems";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const VerticalMenu=()=>{const[openKeys,setOpenKeys]=useState([router.state.location.pathname]);const onOpenChange=keys=>{const latestOpenKey=keys.find(key=>{return openKeys.indexOf(key)===-1;});if(latestOpenKey&&submenuKeys.indexOf(latestOpenKey)===-1){setOpenKeys(keys);}else{setOpenKeys(latestOpenKey?[latestOpenKey]:[]);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sider,{className:"app__menu",theme:"light",width:250,breakpoint:"md",collapsedWidth:50,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{theme:"light",mode:"inline",items:items,style:{height:"100%",borderRight:0},defaultSelectedKeys:openKeys,onSelect:info=>{router.navigate(info.key);},openKeys:openKeys,onOpenChange:onOpenChange})});};export default VerticalMenu;
